function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Formation of secondary chemical species reducing indoor air quality","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Efficiency of voc removal not confirmed for airborne pathogens.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain impact on human health and air quality of plasmacluster ions technology pci .","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible misuse of essential oils in ventilation industry without proper evaluation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hypersensitivity reaction of occupants to essential oils","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Toxicity of essential oils to human and microbial cells","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative effects of silver nanoparticles on health","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient data on minimum ventilation requirement for public premises","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airflow patterns may contribute to the spread of diseases in occupied volumes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for airborne cross-infection due to low air velocity and disturbance of boundary layer around individuals","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Elevated levels of resuspended particles in the room and within the convection flow","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resuspended particles brought into the breathing zone of the occupants","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resuspended particles of respiratory origin calculated for specific settling velocities and dry density of nonvolatile species in saliva","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Particles of respiratory origin being resuspended from the floor","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of inlet and outlet positions on particle deposition and airflow velocity","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of ventilation supply systems in a hospital environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Downward ventilation may not always protect people from cross-infection due to mixing ventilation and free convection around the human body.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Displacement ventilation performs worse when patients are lying sideways, leading to the persistence of exhalation jets over a long distance.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing the throw of the supply jet from the floor diffuser can deteriorate inhaled air quality and promote resuspension of particles including those carrying respiratory pathogens.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The proximity of people in densely occupied spaces increases the risk of disease transmission by contact and droplet transmission despite the use of dilution ventilation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of influenza transmission in a built environment with different ventilation systems mixing, underfloor, personalized","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of cross-infection due to unprotected occupants in rooms with personalized ventilation and other ventilation systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence of air supply diffuser performance on user position, angle, clothing insulation, and ambient air temperature.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Draught felt by people at high air flow rates from personalized air supply nozzles.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low velocity personalized ventilation system may not effectively mitigate the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient air distribution indoors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete knowledge on pathogen transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent information disclosure about the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicting
